title.en: A Prayer Recalling the Life and Liberation of the Great Perfection Adept Rangjung Dorje (‘Naturally Arisen Vajra’), Jigme Lingpa

text.en: To Avalokiteśvara, lord of all saṃsāra and nirvāṇa,
text.en-trans: sizhi kün gyi gönpo chenrezik

text.en: To the son of King Kṛkin who went before Buddha Kāśyapa,1
text.en-trans: chomden ösung drung na kri kri sé

text.en: To Nanda, the younger half-brother of Śākyamuni,
text.en-trans: shakya tubpé chéda chunggawo

text.en: And to the arhat Tsen Zangden, I pray!
text.en-trans: drachom tsen zang den la solwa deb

text.en: To Garab Dorjé and Śrī Siṃha, teachers of the Supreme Vehicle,
text.en-trans: tek chok tönpa garab shiri seng

text.en: To Vimalamitra and Akaramati2who was emanated by Songtsen Gampo,
text.en-trans: drimé shenyen songtsen akarma

text.en: The king Tri Songdeutsen, subject Vairotsana, companion Yeshe Tsogyal, and Gyalsé Lharjé—
text.en-trans: jebang drok sum gyalsé lharjé gyü

text.en: To you who appeared in these various manifestations, I pray!
text.en-trans: namtrul dumar shar la solwa deb

text.en: From when you played games as a child, you were compassionate,
text.en-trans: zhönnu roltsé dü né nyingjé dang

text.en: And your mind was filled with intense renunciation and disenchantment.
text.en-trans: ngejung kyoshé drakpö gyü len té

text.en: Through your disgust for saṃsāra and longing only for solitude,
text.en-trans: wenpa khonar möpé zhenlok gi

text.en: You were victorious in the battle against mindless entertainment—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: dudzi yul lé gyal la solwa deb

text.en: From your twenty-fifth year, you traversed the paths of accumulation and joining,
text.en-trans: nyishu tsangé loné tsok jor lam

text.en: And, through enduring hardships while cultivating devotion and compassion,
text.en-trans: mögü nyingjé kyedzok tablam la

text.en: And following the path of skilful means on the generation and perfection stages,
text.en-trans: drubpé katub tenpé chönyi dön

text.en: You saw thedharmatānature of reality directly and unerringly—to you, I pray!
text.en-trans: manor ngönsum tong la solwa deb

text.en: When, in a cave at glorious Samyé Chimphu,
text.en-trans: pal gyi samyé chimpü gé'u ru

text.en: You beheld the omniscient Longchenpa and received prophecies,
text.en-trans: künkhyen zhalzik lungten tobpé mö

text.en: The treasure of courageous eloquence regarding the nature and multiplicity of things was unlocked,
text.en-trans: jita jinyé pobpé ter drol té

text.en: And the pride of conceit3faded away—to you, I pray!
text.en-trans: ngönpé ngagyal zé la solwa deb

text.en: When the Nyingma teachings had become just like a painted candle,
text.en-trans: nying ten rimö marmé tar gyur dü

text.en: You compiled the tantras, produced a history of Dharma,
text.en-trans: gyübum lekbam dzok dang chöjung trün

text.en: And upheld without fail the teachings of Kama and Terma,
text.en-trans: do gyu sem sum nyingtik kater gyi

text.en: The Heart Essence, the Sūtra, Illusory Net and Mind4—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: tenpa manor dzin la solwa deb

text.en: When the Nyingma tenets were sullied and denigrated
text.en-trans: ngagyur drubta chöluk natsok kyi

text.en: By various other traditions,
text.en-trans: nyokmar gyur la zhen dé shungwé tsé

text.en: Your great chariots of the Treasury of Precious Qualities5
text.en-trans: yönten rinchen dzö kyi shingta ché

text.en: Elevated our own tenets—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: rang dé drubta long la solwa deb

text.en: Those of little learning and limited intelligence
text.en-trans: töpa nyung dang lodrö lünpo nam

text.en: Hold only partial views, just like the frog that lived in a well.6
text.en-trans: trönpé lak dro mongpé chok dzin yang

text.en: Yet amidst the constellations of scholars and holy beings,
text.en-trans: khé dang dampé gyukar chenpö ü

text.en: You blaze like the sun of the teachings—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: tenpé nyinjé bar la solwa deb

text.en: Noble ones, who have obtained qualities of freedom and realization,
text.en-trans: gangzhik pakpé pang tok nyepa nam

text.en: Transcend ordinary concepts, since they abide in reality.
text.en-trans: namtok ranggyü lé dé chönyi chir

text.en: Thus, when yourprajñāborn of meditation became as complete as a full moon,
text.en-trans: gomjung sherab dawa nyagang né

text.en: You gained a treasure trove of Dharma—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: chö kyi terdzö nyé la solwa deb

text.en: You remained in solitude, but still those with karmic fortune
text.en-trans: wenpa khonar bé kyang lechen nam

text.en: Gathered from afar, like swans drawn to a lake.
text.en-trans: tso la ngangpa jizhin ring né du

text.en: Those without fortune, no matter how close, cannot be tamed,
text.en-trans: kalmé taktu nyen kyang mi tul na

text.en: And so you renounce positions of leadership—to you, I pray!
text.en-trans: mangpö tsok pön pang la solwa deb

text.en: Thinking of the trifling concerns that are the bounties of this life,
text.en-trans: nok chung tsé di püntsok la mik né

text.en: You do not try to combine worldly ways with Dharma,
text.en-trans: jikten chö dang tünpar mi juk kyang

text.en: But practise pure yogic discipline, free from hypocrisy—
text.en-trans: namtar ngokok pangpé tulzhuk la

text.en: To you whose ways would delight Saraha himself, I pray!
text.en-trans: sarahapa gyé la solwa deb

text.en: Though beings are short-tempered, you strive to benefit them and the teachings.
text.en-trans: lona tung yang ten drö dön la tsön

text.en: Not belittling basic Dharma methods for setting out upon the genuine path,
text.en-trans: yangdak lam juk chö tsul tsam mi mö

text.en: And not becoming arrogant through praise and respect—
text.en-trans: tö ngak kurti mi kheng drokur gyi

text.en: To you, a warrior unafraid of flattery or disparagement, I pray!
text.en-trans: jikdral pawo khyé la solwa deb

text.en: You do not make a show of offerings received out of devotion or on behalf of the dead,
text.en-trans: déshin dzé la zijin mi drub ching

text.en: But produce representations of enlightened body, speech and mind, such as the Buddha’s Words.
text.en-trans: kangyur lasok ku sung tuk ten trün

text.en: Make myriad offerings at the sacred sites of the ancestral kings, liberate lives, and so on—
text.en-trans: méwön né la tri chö sok lu sok

text.en: To you, who benefits all with whom you are connected, I pray!
text.en-trans: dreltsé dönden jor la solwa deb

text.en: In meditation and post-meditation alike, you are unperturbed
text.en-trans: nyamjé küntu chakdang redok kyi

text.en: By attachment or aversion, hope or fear.
text.en-trans: khyö sem trukpa mayin wangpo la

text.en: Through your blessing, Avalokiteśvara in the flesh,
text.en-trans: chenrezik gön zhukpé jinlab kyi

text.en: You benefit beings and dredge the depths of saṃsāra—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: dro dön khorwa dongtruk la solwa deb

text.en: Yet still, until the realms of beings are brought to perfection,
text.en-trans: dadung semchen kham ni madzokpar

text.en: You act for beings’ benefit. Since the special power
text.en-trans: zhendön jungwa changchub sem nyi kyi

text.en: Of the two kinds of bodhicitta is undeceiving,
text.en-trans: khyechö luwa mepa yinpé chir

text.en: There is no being who is not your disciple.
text.en-trans: duljar magyur semchen yö min yang

text.en: But still, I pray: having become your disciple, may I keep my samaya pure
text.en-trans: lobmar gyur né damtsik dakpa dang

text.en: And act as commanded; may my mind merge with your wisdom.
text.en-trans: ka zhin drub né tuk yi drepa nam

text.en: Throughout all my lives, may circumstances be right for us to never part,
text.en-trans: tserab küntu dralmé tendrel drik

text.en: And may I become indivisible from you, the Buddha ‘Completely Victorious’!
text.en-trans: nampar gyalwachen dang yermé shok
